name: SGL Network
overview:
SGL provides an easy and safe mobile payment service in the world called “Yinfu,” (roughly translated from Mandarin to “voice pay.”

SGL was founded by Paul Swartz and Mark Friesen and is headquartered in Tianjin China. It’s focus is on providing better access to financial services to people and small businesses in emerging markets.

SGL uses voice biometric technology to verify a persons physical identity. To pay a bill or send money takes less than a minute and all it takes is saying a simple pass phrase to authorize the payment.

milestones.description: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China ICBC became the first bank member the SGL Network
Won the 2011 Excellence in Innovation Award from the Financial Forum sponsored by the People's Bank of China
milestones.source_description: 银行支付的新时代——音付

milestones.description: Agricultural Bank of China joins the SGL Network.
